summaries.title: Zaɓuka kusan 100 INEC za ta ƙarasa a watan gobe
summaries.description: A wani saƙo da ta wallafa a shafinta na Twitter ranar Litinin, INEC  ta ce ta yanke wannan shawara ce bayan wata ganawa tsakanin manyan jami'anta.

summaries.title: Ƴan Najeriya za su yi kewar Buhari idan ya gama mulki – Garba Shehu
summaries.description: Wannan shafi ne da yake kawo muku abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya.

summaries.title: Abin da ya sa muka dakatar da Iyorchia Ayu - PDP
summaries.description: Jam'iyyar PDP ta ce ta dakatar da shugabanta na ƙasa, Iyorchia Ayu bisa zargin sa da wasu ayyuka na cin amanar jam'iyyar.

summaries.title: 'Yadda surukata ta ɓata cikin laka bayan mahaukaciyar guguwa'
summaries.description: Jikokin Violet Frank guda biyu suna tuna mata surukarta da ta ɓata, bayan afkuwar mummunar guguwar da ta yi sanadin rugujewar ɗaruruwan gidaje.

summaries.title: Rundunar sojin Najeriya ta ƙaryata zargin kisan ƙananan yara
summaries.description: Wannan shafi ne da yake kawo muku abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya.

summaries.title: Yadda matan Indiya suke amfani da allura domin kariya daga cin zarafi
summaries.description: Kusan kowace mace a Indiya tana da labarin da za ta bayar na cin zarafin da ya faru a wajen taron mutane-Ko dai wani ya taba mata mama ko taba mata duwawunta, ko ya zunguri mamanta ko ya mata goge.

summaries.title: Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Bintu ta Dadin Kowa
summaries.description: A wannan mako, mun tattauna da Fatima Sa'id Abdullahi wadda aka fi sani da Bintu a shirin fim mai dogon zango, Dadin Kowa.

summaries.title: 'Abin da ya sa muke so a zaɓi Akpabio shugaban Majalisar Dattijai'
summaries.description: Dalilan da suka sanya tsofaffin sanatoci ke son Sanata Godswill Akpabio ya zama shugaban Majalisar Dattijan Najeriya.

summaries.title: Yadda Turkiyya ta canza a ƙarƙashin mulkin Erdogan
summaries.description: Zaɓen jin ra'ayin jama'a ya nuna cewa shugaban na fuskantar gagarumar adawa daga wajen babban abokin karawarsa, Kemal Kilicdaroglu.

summaries.title: Sana'ar gargajiyar da har yanzu ke fid da matasan zamani kunya
summaries.description: A bidiyon, matashi Mukhtar Muhammad ya yi bayani game da sana'ar ta bugu da yadda ake yin ta. Ya ce sana'ar ta bugu ta yi masa rana don kuwa, da ita ya samu ya kammala karatunsa, ya gina gida sannan ya yi aure, kuma yake riƙe iyalinsa.

summaries.title: Matashin da ke burin ƙera wa sojojin Najeriya jiragen yaƙi
summaries.description: Wani matashi mai fasahar ƙere-ƙere a Najeriya ya ce ya fara tunanin ƙera wa sojojin Najeriya jirgin yaƙi na sama maras matuƙi ne a lokacin da aka sace ɗaliban sakandiren Kankara su fiye da 300.

summaries.title: Abin da ya sa nake bin ra’ayi ƴaƴana game da rayuwarsu – Ali Nuhu
summaries.description: Fitaccen jarumin fina-finan Hausa na Kannywood Ali Nuhu ya ce inda don ta shi ne ya fi so ɗansa ya gaje shi a harkar fim.

summaries.title: Muna fata sarki Charles lll ya yi koyi  da mahaifiyarsa wajen riƙe ƙasashen Afirka - Bazoum
summaries.description: Shugaban ƙasar Nijar Mohamed Bazoum ya ce ƙasarsa da Birtaniya na da babbar alaƙa, kasancewa a shekarun baya-bayan na Birtaniya ta buɗe ofishin jakadanci a ƙasar domin ƙarfafa zumunci tsakanin ƙasashen biyu.

summaries.title: Na sha suka ne kawai saboda a cusguna wa mijina - Turai 'Yar'adua
summaries.description: Uwargidan tsohon shugaban Najeriya, ta ce a kullum tana tuna rayuwarsu da Umaru 'Yar'adua, "kawai dai bambancin yau (ranar cikarsa shekara 13 da rasuwa) ina jin daɗi saboda mutane suna taruwa ana karatu(n Alƙur'ani), ana yi masa addu'a".

summaries.title: Ku San Malamanku  tare da Sheik Imam Mansur
summaries.description: Sheik Mansur ɗaya ne daga cikin fitattun malaman Ɗariƙar Tijjaniya a jihar Kano

summaries.title: Lokacin da ƴan Najeriya daga Sudan suka haɗu da ƴan’uwansu a Abuja
summaries.description: Rukuni na farko na daliban na Najeriya daga Sudan waɗanda ke guje wa yaki sun isa gida ne da talatainin dare, ranar Laraba.

summaries.title: Wane ne Charles, sabon sarkin Birtaniya?
summaries.description: A ranar Asabar 6 ga watan Mayu ne za a rantsar da Sarki Charles a matsayin sarkin Birtaniya.

summaries.title: Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Saude ta Daɗin Kowa
Sergio Busquets zai bar Barcelona a karshen kakar bana
summaries.description: Kyaftin Sergio Busquets ya tabbatar da zai bar Barcelona a karshen kakar nan, bayan shekara 18 yana Camp Nou.

summaries.title: Inter ta ci Milan a Champions League a wasan hamayya
summaries.description: Inter Milan ta doke AC Milan da cin 2-0 a wasan farko a daf da karshe a Champions League ranar Laraba a Sansiro.

summaries.title: Man Utd za ta sayi Ramos, Chelsea na son riƙe Felix
summaries.description: Man Utd ta tattauna da Benfica domin sayen Goncalo Ramos, yayin da Chelsea za ta bayar da 'yan wasa biyu da kuɗi don riƙe Felix.

summaries.title: Saka na daf da saka hannu kan ci gaba da taka leda a Arsenal
summaries.description: Arsenal na sa ran sanar da kulla yarjejeniya kafin karshen Premier League ta bana da cewar Bukayo Saka ya amince zai ci gaba da wasa a Gunners.

summaries.title: Inaki Pena zai ci gaba da golan Barca zuwa 2026
summaries.description: Barcelona ta cimma yarjejeniya da Inaki Pena, domin ya ci gaba da wasa a kungiyar zuwa karshen kakar Yunin 2026.

summaries.title: Real Madrid da Man City sun tashi 1-1 a Champions League
summaries.description: Real Madrid da Manchester City sun tashi 1-1 a wasan farko a daf da karshe a Champions League ranar Talata a Santiago Bernabeu.

summaries.title: PSG na zawarcin Mourinho, Messi da Al Hilal sun kasa cimma matsaya
summaries.description: Mai bayar da shawara kan harkokin ƙwallon ƙafa na PSG, Luis Campos ya yi magana da wakilin Jose Mourinho a kan zama kociyan ƙungiyar.

summaries.title: Messi da Argentina sun lashe bikin kyautukan Laureus na wasanni
summaries.description: Lionel Messi ya lashe kyautar fitatcen dan wasa, yayin da Argentina ta zama gwarzuwar tawaga ta shekara a bikin Laureus World Sports Awards.

summaries.title: Fulham ta kara yin kasa da Leicester a teburin Premier
summaries.description: Fulham ta kara sa Leicester City cikin matsi, bayan cin 5-3 ranar Litinin a wasan mako na 35 a Premier League a Craven Cottage.

summaries.title: Artur Dias ne zai busa wasan Real da City a Champions League
summaries.description: Artur Dias ne zai busa wasan Real Madrid da Manchester City a Champions League ranar Talata.

summaries.title: Za mu kare cikin 'yan hudun farko a Premier League - Ten Hag
summaries.description: Erik ten Hag ya ce har yanzu Manchester United tana da damar kammala gasar Premier League ta bana a cikin 'yan hudun farko.

summaries.title: Barcelona na son Gundogan, Napoli za ta rike Osimhen
summaries.description: Barcelona na da kwarin gwiwar kammala cinikin dan wasan tsakiya na Manchester City da Jamus Ilkay Gundogan.

summaries.title: Da wuya a samu maganin cutar kansa a nan kusa – Bincike
summaries.description: Sakamakon nazarin da aka gudanar ta hanyar bibiyar cutukan kansa na tsawon shekara tara, ya bai wa masu bincike mamaki da tsoro kan irin jan aikin da ke gabansu.

summaries.title: An yi gwajin ƙwayar hana haihuwa ga maza
summaries.description: Masana kimiyya sun ce akwai yiwuwar a ci nasara wajen tabbatar da wata ƙwayar hana haihuwa, bayan gano wani sanadari da ke iya hana maniyyi tafiya zuwa wurin da ƙwayaye suke.
summaries.imageAlt: Maniyyi lokacin da yake shiga cikin ƙwai

summaries.title: Saudiyya za ta tura mace ta farko zuwa sararin samaniya a 2023
summaries.description: Ƙasar Saudiyya ta bayyana cewa za ta aika mace ta farko cikin 'yan sama jannatin da za ta tura zuwa sararin samaniya a cikin wannan shekarar.
summaries.imageAlt: Tashar sararin samaniya ta ƙasa da ƙasa

summaries.title: Ƙasashen da za su yi rige-rigen zuwa duniyar wata a 2023
summaries.description: A shekarar 2023, Rasha da Indiya da Hukumar Kula da Sararin Samaniyar Tarayyar Turai za su ƙdaamar da shirin zuwa duniyar wata da kuma kutsawa can cikin sararin samaniya.will be launching missions to the Moon, and further into deep space.
summaries.imageAlt: Picture of nose cone of Artemis-i SLS rocket and Orion capsule on launch gantry with moon above

summaries.title: Masana kimiyya sun gano sirrin kwaɗi masu jikin tangaran da kamewar jini
summaries.description: Tun da daɗewa masana kimiyya suna da masaniya game da kwaɗo mai jikin tangaran amma ba su iya fahimtar yadda yake rikiɗa har ake iya ganin cikin cikinsa ba.

summaries.title: Za a fara duba yawan ruwan da ke doron duniya daga sararin samaniya
summaries.description: Hukumar sararin samaniya ta Amurka ta ƙaddamar da wani tauraron ɗan adam za ta yi bincike na farko kan yawan ruwan da ke kwarara a doron duniya.

summaries.title: Abin da ya kamata ku sani kan ƙirƙirar kazar da za ta dinga haifar kaza zalla
summaries.description: Masu bincike a Isra'ila sun ce sun ƙirƙiri kazar da aka yi wa ƙwayoyin halittarta kwaskwarima don su dinga haifar kaji mata zalla.
summaries.imageAlt: 'Yan tsakin da aka jirkita wa ƙwayoyin halitta za su dinga haihuwar kaji ne kawai ban da zakaru

summaries.title: Jirgin da Nasa ta aika duniyar wata ya komo duniyarmu ta Earth lafiya
summaries.description: Kan rokar mai suna Orion capsule, ya fado kasa cikin Tekun Pacific, bayan ya yi wa duniyar wata shigar burtu, tare da dawowa doron kasa.

summaries.title: Yadda ƴan sama jannatin Nasa suka fita tattaki a sararin samaniya
summaries.description: A﻿ wannan bidiyon za ku ga yadda ƴan sama jannatin Nasa suka fita tattaki daga cikin tashar ƙasa da ƙasa da ke shawagi a sararin samaniya don kafa faifan solar a kan tashar ta ISS.

summaries.title: M﻿e ke faruwa a cikin dutse mafi girma mai aman wuta?
summaries.description: T﻿algen wutan yana ta kwarara ta gefen dutsen a zafin da ya kai digiri 1,000 a ma'aunin celcius, sai dai masana na cewa wannan ba zai kasance wata barazana ba ga mazauna wurin.

summaries.title: An haife tagwayen da aka daskarar da 'yan tayinsu shekara 30 da suka wuce
summaries.description: "﻿Shekarata biyar a lokacin da Ubangiji ya wanzar da rayuwar Lydia da Timothy, ya kuma ta adana rayuwar tasu sun lokacin har sai yanzu da suka zama mutane," kamar yadda Philip Ridgeway ya shaida wa CNN.

summaries.title: Yadda k﻿umbon Artemis ya isa duniyar wata lami lafiya
summaries.description: Nasa ta ce zuwa yanzu dai shirin "ya wuce yadda aka tsammace shi" tun bayan ƙaddamar da shi a makon da ya gabata.

dataSource: Data is from Live TIPO page
